    • moveBlackDown

      private void moveBlackDown​(RedBlackTree.RedBlackNode<E> localRoot)
      Check to see whether both children of the given node are red. If so, make them black and change the localRoot's color to red.
      Parameters:
      localRoot - The node to check whether both children are red or not
